color_description: Absolute deep black with slight oily sheen
traditional_use: Cartographic boundary marking; Archive critical notation
notes: Pitchy black absorbs all light. Best for indicating voids or boundaries.

color_description: Medium gray with visible mineral particles
traditional_use: Background washes; terrain texture indication
notes: Grainy texture visible in application. Used for unstable terrain.

traditional_use: Matte coatings; ghost rendering; faded effects
notes: Covers Yeller. Associated with concealment and mystery.

traditional_use: Highlights; structural elements; Archive formal documents
notes: Densbone skulls particularly valued. Ground fine for pigment.

color_description: Deep rust orange with earthy warmth
traditional_use: Earth tones; warm highlights; creature rendering
notes: Iron-rich deposits produce this signature Quarry color.

color_description: Dark rust brown with red undertones
traditional_use: Metallic surfaces; aging effects; Wharver illustration
notes: Natural oxidation from Quarry iron. Used for metal textures.

traditional_use: Creature illustration; metallic highlights; warm accents
notes: Collected from creature encounters. Distinctive metallic quality.

color_description: Rich gold with slight warm cast
traditional_use: Gilding; accent marks; ceremonial documents
notes: Aureate creatures yield distinctive gold. Not as stable as mineral gold.

traditional_use: Warning marks; emphasis; creature spots
notes: Limited yield from red spots only. Used sparingly.

extraction_method: Oak galls and iron sulfate processing
traditional_use: Standard Archive writing; formal documents; manuscript copying
notes: Standard Archive ink. Darkens from gray-black to true black over time.

traditional_use: Historical documents; marginalia; informal notes
notes: Secondary Archive ink for informal use.

traditional_use: Cosmetic trade; decorative manuscripts; special effects
notes: Sold for Capital Cosmetics trade. Fades in strong light.

traditional_use: Leather dyeing; deep black requirements
notes: From bird leather processing. Polks' overalls made from this.

color_description: Warm brown with wood grain undertone
traditional_use: Wood textures; organic surfaces; creature illustration
notes: Ligneous shell produces distinctive grain-like pigment.

color_description: Cool gray with slight blue cast
traditional_use: Camouflage rendering; stone surfaces; Dens creatures
notes: Stone-like camouflage quality carries into pigment.

traditional_use: Detritus rendering; muck surfaces; Dens terrain
notes: Abundant at Dens periphery. Earthy organic quality.

traditional_use: Aquatic creatures; mineral-organic hybrid textures
notes: Single specimen source. Unique mineral-organic quality.

traditional_use: Stone textures; subtle gradients; tunneled environments
notes: From rare captures at tunnel mouths. Subtle quality.

color_description: Polished steel gray with metallic sheen
traditional_use: Tower illustration; metal surfaces; technological elements
notes: Steel-shining stuff of the Tower. Hovering structure material.

traditional_use: Light effects; water rendering; Tower crown
notes: Fountain water at Tower crown. Light-emitting at night.

traditional_use: Desert scenes; siege camp rendering; food illustration
notes: Hard maize-dotted cob from siege camps.

traditional_use: Camp structures; dried earth; defensive works
notes: Dried clod-mud from siege construction.

traditional_use: Formal manuscripts; Archive records; publication
notes: Best quality paper for archival work.

traditional_use: Important works; binding; ceremonial documents
notes: Vellum quality for significant manuscripts.

traditional_use: Field notebooks; expedition logs; practical documentation
notes: Rougher texture. Durable for field use.

traditional_use: Maps; important expedition records; trade documents
notes: Metal as skin - skin of a rocky sort. Brings out grit of travel.

traditional_use: Survey maps; technical drawings; Guild submissions
notes: Standard for Guild mapping work.

traditional_use: Trade catalogs; advertising; printed materials
notes: Commercial grade for mass printing.

traditional_use: Field notebooks; expedition bindings; durable covers
notes: Standard expedition binding material.

traditional_use: Formal manuscript binding; Archive holdings
notes: Standard Archive binding for cataloged works.

traditional_use: Specimen collection; field equipment covers
notes: Guild-approved treatment for preservation.

traditional_use: Ceremonial documents; illumination; Archive treasures
notes: Reserved for most significant manuscripts.

traditional_use: Compass rose elements; directional markers
notes: Three-Compassed orientation (no East).

traditional_use: Elevation indication; heat maps; high-value areas
notes: Cartographic Guild standard for elevation.

traditional_use: Medium elevation; transition zones
notes: Mid-range elevation standard.

traditional_use: Low elevation; water; cool zones
notes: Low-range and aquatic indication.

traditional_use: Contour lines; precise boundaries; Guild maps
notes: Thinner than standard for fine contour work.

traditional_use: Observer emotional state; hazard notation; Form 17-B
notes: Required for observer state recording per Dens Principles.

traditional_use: Edge settlement bindings; domestic documents
notes: Domesticated by edge settlements. Readily available.

traditional_use: Pigment binding; illumination work; fine detail
notes: Common Dens fowl provides steady supply.

traditional_use: Insect rendering; bark textures; Dens surface creatures
notes: Surface-dwelling. Easy to capture for processing.

traditional_use: Movement rendering; uncertain boundaries; shifting forms
notes: Movement pattern defies prediction. Residue similarly unstable.

traditional_use: Organic highlights; vegetation; living elements
notes: Specimens readily captured. Distinctive color.

traditional_use: Oil medium for pigments; glazing
notes: Urban periphery creature. Well-documented supply.

traditional_use: Aquatic rendering; silver highlights; pool creatures
notes: Kept in pools by local crews. Controlled supply.

traditional_use: Danger indication; blood rendering; extreme hazard marking
notes: Dangerous proximity required. High hazard collection.

traditional_use: Cave rendering; organic depth; Eastern Sector scenes
notes: Large colony documented. Abundant material.

traditional_use: Specialty binding agent; unusual viscosity
notes: Indirect observation - limited collection opportunities.

traditional_use: Seasonal markers; migration illustration; spring themes
notes: Seasonal migration provides annual supply.

traditional_use: Commercial illustration; advertising; popular media
notes: Brand using orange lizard for ads. Synthetic production.

color_description: Cool silt gray with organic depth
traditional_use: River rendering; Dead River journeys; passage illustration
notes: Dead River passage material. Associated with transformation.

color_description: Deepest black with hints of blue
traditional_use: Grimslew rendering (theoretical); ultimate darkness
notes: Dreaded fish. No specimen possible - too dangerous. Color extrapolated.

traditional_use: Yeller documentation; plural being notation; cipher work
notes: For Yeller Protocols per Appendix C. Special formulation.

traditional_use: Extreme danger marking; stakdur territory indication
notes: Too dangerous for specimen collection. Color from observation.

traditional_use: Form 17-B hazard reporting; warning markers
notes: Official hazard reporting color.

traditional_use: Manuscript numbering; Archive catalog notation
notes: Standard for MS-XXXX identifiers.

notes: Report from Capeast expedition. No direct observation.

traditional_use: Imaginary access illustration; W2 bridge concepts
notes: Physical-imaginative bridge rendering. Conceptual material.
